body_html:
We've been moving modules around it preparation for the 1.0 release so that only API that we will keep stable is in the tf module and its submodules (excluding tf.contrib). Much of the rnn functionality is now in tf.contrib.rnn.

Hope that helps.
body_text:
We've been moving modules around it preparation for the 1.0 release so that only API that we will keep stable is in the tf module and its submodules (excluding tf.contrib). Much of the rnn functionality is now in tf.contrib.rnn.
Hope that helps.
body:
We've been moving modules around it preparation for the 1.0 release so that only API that we will keep stable is in the `tf` module and its submodules (excluding `tf.contrib`). Much of the `rnn` functionality is now in `tf.contrib.rnn`.

Hope that helps.
